description: SMTP service in (1) Microsoft Windows 2000 and (2) Internet Mail Connector (IMC) in Exchange Server 5.5 does not properly handle responses to NTLM authentication, which allows remote attackers to perform mail relaying via an SMTP AUTH command using null session credentials.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0054

description: SMTP service in Microsoft Windows 2000, Windows XP Professional, and Exchange 2000 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a command with a malformed data transfer (BDAT) request.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0055

description: Buffer overflow in SQL Server 7.0 and 2000 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long OLE DB provider name to (1) OpenDataSource or (2) OpenRowset in an ad hoc connection.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0056

description: XMLHTTP control in Microsoft XML Core Services 2.6 and later does not properly handle IE Security Zone settings, which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files by specifying a local file as an XML Data Source.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0057

description: Vulnerability in Java Runtime Environment (JRE) allows remote malicious web sites to hijack or sniff a web client's sessions, when an HTTP proxy is being used, via a Java applet that redirects the session to another server, as seen in (1) Netscape 6.0 through 6.1 and 4.79 and earlier, (2) Microsoft VM build 3802 and earlier as used in Internet Explorer 4.x and 5.x, and possibly other implementations that use vulnerable versions of SDK or JDK.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0058

description: The decompression algorithm in zlib 1.1.3 and earlier, as used in many different utilities and packages, causes inflateEnd to release certain memory more than once (a "double free"), which may allow local and remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a block of malformed compression data.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0059

description: IRC connection tracking helper module in the netfilter subsystem for Linux 2.4.18-pre9 and earlier does not properly set the mask for conntrack expectations for incoming DCC connections, which could allow remote attackers to bypass intended firewall restrictions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0060

description: Apache for Win32 before 1.3.24, and 2.0.x before 2.0.34-beta, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters (a | pipe character) provided as arguments to batch (.bat) or .cmd scripts, which are sent unfiltered to the shell interpreter, typically cmd.exe.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0061

description: Buffer overflow in ncurses 5.0, and the ncurses4 compatibility package as used in Red Hat Linux, allows local users to gain privileges, related to "routines for moving the physical cursor and scrolling."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0062

description: Buffer overflow in ippRead function of CUPS before 1.1.14 may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via long attribute names or language values.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0063

description: Squid 2.4 STABLE3 and earlier does not properly disable HTCP, even when "htcp_port 0" is specified in squid.conf, which could allow remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0067

description: Squid 2.4 STABLE3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (core dump) and possibly execute arbitrary code with an ftp:// URL with a larger number of special characters, which exceed the buffer when Squid URL-escapes the characters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0068

description: Memory leak in SNMP in Squid 2.4 STABLE3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0069

description: Buffer overflow in Windows Shell (used as the Windows Desktop) allows local and possibly remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a custom URL handler that has not been removed for an application that has been improperly uninstalled.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0070

description: Java Runtime Environment (JRE) Bytecode Verifier allows remote attackers to escape the Java sandbox and execute commands via an applet containing an illegal cast operation, as seen in (1) Microsoft VM build 3802 and earlier as used in Internet Explorer 4.x and 5.x, (2) Netscape 6.2.1 and earlier, and possibly other implementations that use vulnerable versions of SDK or JDK, aka a variant of the "Virtual Machine Verifier" vulnerability.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0076

description: The zone determination function in Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 and 6.0 allows remote attackers to run scripts in the Local Computer zone by embedding the script in a cookie, aka the "Cookie-based Script Execution" vulnerability.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0078

description: rsync, when running in daemon mode, does not properly call setgroups before dropping privileges, which could provide supplemental group privileges to local users, who could then read certain files that would otherwise be disallowed.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0080

description: Buffer overflows in (1) php_mime_split in PHP 4.1.0, 4.1.1, and 4.0.6 and earlier, and (2) php3_mime_split in PHP 3.0.x allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a multipart/form-data HTTP POST request when file_uploads is enabled.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0081

description: The dbm and shm session cache code in mod_ssl before 2.8.7-1.3.23, and Apache-SSL before 1.3.22+1.46, does not properly initialize memory using the i2d_SSL_SESSION function, which allows remote attackers to use a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code via a large client certificate that is signed by a trusted Certificate Authority (CA), which produces a large serialized session.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0082

description: Off-by-one error in the channel code of OpenSSH 2.0 through 3.0.2 allows local users or remote malicious servers to gain privileges.

description: Buffer overflow in admintool in Solaris 2.6, 7, and 8 allows local users to gain root privileges via a long media installation path.

description: config_converters.py in BSCW (Basic Support for Cooperative Work) 3.x and versions before 4.06 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the file name during filename conversion.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0101

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0103

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2002-0104
